subtitle: Marian Franz and conscientious objection to military taxation
title: A persistent voice
by_statement: edited by David R. Bassett, Steve Ratzlaff, and Tim Godshall ; foreword by Andy Jacobs.

description.value: "These essays by Marian Franz span her 23 years of lobbying Congress to enact the Peace Tax Fund Bill, which would allow conscientious objectors to pay taxes into a fund for nonmilitary purposes only. Franz is joined by eight colleagues who contribute chapters unique to their perspectives and expertise on related topics." "[summary]"--Provided by publisher.
